title: BBQ Revolution - Food Truck
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Fast food, Take-out only
description: Vegan food truck at this location outside The Lost Well since summer 2015; previously at 3111 Manor Rd (location changes so check its webpage). Offers BBQ smoked on a smoker and served on a plate with sides like potato salad, coleslaw, mac and cheeze. Service stops when food runs out, so best to call ahead. Began service since Nov 2013.
